objects.name: Analytic 0832
objects.description: Detects execution of archiving utilities (tar, gzip, bzip2, xz, zip, openssl) followed by suspicious archive file creation. Correlates archive creation in temporary or staging directories with execution of commands involving compression or encryption options.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve: Execution of tar, gzip, bzip2, xz, zip, or openssl with compression/encryption arguments

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:FILE
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: create: Creation of archive files in /tmp, /var/tmp, or user home directories

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: List of archiving utilities considered suspicious.
Paths where archive creation is flagged as unusual (e.g., /tmp, /var/tmp).
Correlation window for linking utility execution with archive creation.
